title: Transportation Library: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: In addition to students and scholars from Northwestern University, the Transportation Library welcomes researchers from the local community, across the United States, and abroad. University Library Level 5, 1970 Campus Drive, Evanston, IL 60208 Circulating materials are available for pickup through NUsearch. Contact transportationlibrary@northwestern.edu to get started with research consultations, instruction, and individual inquiries, or to request non-circulating materials. The collections of the Transportation Library are searchable in the library’s catalog, NUsearch. Contact Transportation Library staff or connect with us on Twitter or Instagram.
